entries.title: Ukraine Steps Up Attacks on Russian Targets in Occupied Territory
entries.description: Kyiv sought to destabilize occupying Russian forces and put them on the back foot as the Kremlin said the attacks were dragging the West further into the war.

entries.title: Prince Harry Takes Aim at William in Latest Royal Drama
entries.description: The latest installment of the series “Harry & Meghan” landed in Britain in time for breakfast Thursday.

entries.title: EU Greenlights 15% Corporate Minimum Tax
entries.description: Countries in the bloc are set to start collecting additional taxes in 2024 under a long-stalled global deal, after Hungary and Poland dropped their objections.

entries.title: ECB, BOE Raise Rates by Half a Percentage Point
entries.description: The central banks of the eurozone, the U.K. and Switzerland increased interest rates by 0.5 point, following the Federal Reserve in slowing the pace of increases as inflation edges lower across advanced economies.

entries.title: Russia's Influence Campaign in Africa Targets a U.S. Ally
entries.description: As America’s sway across the resource-rich continent has declined, Moscow has stepped up its efforts to boost support, including in Uganda.

entries.title: China's Leaders Plot Pivot Back Toward Boosting Economy
entries.description: Senior officials are setting a robust GDP growth target of more than 5% for next year as they loosen Covid rules and de-emphasize ideology.
